text.div:
QuestionnaireReponse Generate Health Certificate

OPERATION: QuestionnaireReponse Generate Health Certificate

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

http://fhir.org/guides/who/svc/OperationDefinition/SHC-QuestionnaireReponse-generateHealthCertificate

Generate a signed QR Code based on a SHC QuestionnaireResponse

URL: [base]/QuestionnaireResponse/$generateHealthCertificate

URL: [base]/QuestionnaireResponse/[id]/$generateHealthCertificate

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INresponse0..1QuestionnaireResponse

The questionnaire response resource used to generate the QR code.

INid0..1id

The questionnaire response resource id used to generate the QR code.

OUTqr-code1..1Binary

The QR Code PNG that was generated.

OUTqr-content1..1QuestionnaireResponse

The signed QR Code content that was used to generate the image.

OUTcertificate0..1uri

The URI of the location of the certificate when available.

name: QuestionnaireReponse Generate Health Certificate
description:
Generate a signed QR Code based on a [SHC 
QuestionnaireResponse](StructureDefinition-shc-questionnaireresponse.html)

parameter.name: response
parameter.documentation: The questionnaire response resource used to generate the QR code.

parameter.name: id
parameter.documentation: The questionnaire response resource id used to generate the QR code.

parameter.name: qr-code
parameter.documentation: The QR Code PNG that was generated.

parameter.name: qr-content
parameter.documentation: The signed QR Code content that was used to generate the image.

parameter.name: certificate
parameter.documentation: The URI of the location of the certificate when available.
